subject: Accelerator Pedal Replacement
description_text:
Hey There simsonn support, im writing to you guys in the regard of my
racing pedals, i bought a pair of plus X pedals and they have been
fantastic until now.
I was racing on my sim and suddenly i lost the control of the accelerator,
after looking at the cord i found it fringed out of the connector and left
the ethernet style connector inside the pedal relay.
I couldnt find an individual gas pedal so i was wondering if i need to
purchase a clutch and turn it into an accelerator or what.
If you guys could get back to me soon that would be great!!
Have a good rest of your guys week.
-Owen Johnson

conversations.body_text: Hi Owen Johnson,   Please provide a photo so we can analyze the issue. Also, kindly include your order number, contact name, phone number, and shipping address.

Hey there,

Of course the order number is :
SSN2504
You can Contact me at (505) 241-9828, and my address is 516 N 14th street
Gunnison Co 81231
Here’s what happened, i was racing and suddenly loss gas, check the wiring,
the gas pedal wire got pulled out from the input hub leaving the connector
behind.
I was looking to purchase a replacement,
The pedals have been great otherwise!!
Thank you for your quick response!
Owen
On Wed, Oct 15, 2025 at 11:34 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Owen Johnson,     If there’s a computer repair shop nearby, you can ask them to re-crimp a new RJ11 connector, following the same wiring order as the brake pedal. If that doesn’t resolve the issue, we can send you a new sensor free of charge. Please provide your order number, contact name, phone number, and address, and we’ll arrange the shipment as soon as possible.

Awesome, thank you so much!
